fulfillRequest(bytes32,bytes,bytes).details: Either response or error parameter will be set, but never both

params.err: Aggregated error from the execution of the user code or from the execution pipeline
params.requestId: The request ID, returned by sendRequest()
params.response: Aggregated response from the execution of the user's source code

handleOracleFulfillment(bytes32,bytes,by.details: Either response or error parameter will be set, but never both.

params.err: Aggregated error either from the request's source code or from the execution pipeline.
params.response: Aggregated response from the request's source code.

fulfillRequest(bytes32,bytes,bytes).notice: User defined function to handle a response from the DON

handleOracleFulfillment(bytes32,bytes,by.notice: Chainlink Functions response handler called by the Functions Router during fullilment from the designated transmitter node in an OCR round.

documentation.text:
@title The Chainlink Functions client contract
 @notice Contract developers can inherit this contract in order to make Chainlink Functions requests
